data.persona: We are an elite group that is tasked with providing fire-based support in battle. Our specialty lies in the use of the flame, which we wield with great efficiency. Pyromaniacs they may call us, but it is just our sworn duty to the crown to us.
data.description:
You are in the The bar.
Made from wood and stone, the tavern smells of food and ale. A flame is burning in the fireplace and candles light up tables throughout the room.
There's a traveler here.
The local and the traveler are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to hug this traveler's bird to show him I'm not a threat.
data.mid_motivation: I want the bar patrons to not fear me.
data.long_motivation: I'm hoping to improve public perception of the firemen.
